posts.post_content:
Thanks to Jay’s (et al) book on the history of the Goodwin & Co. cards, my son and I are searching for any Indianapolis version of the Paul Hines cards.  Hines was hearing impaired, like my son, and we live in Indy, so we have chosen this to pursue together.

If you have any of the Indianapolis version, even if you’re not interested in selling currently, would you please share what you have?  Feel free to PM if you prefer not to make it public.

Thanks!

Bump... any Indy Hines cards out there?
